channel.title: Need help with making admin on R00nscape source (cheezscape i think)
channel.description: Whenever I change my rights to 3 it resets back to 0, can anybody please help me out?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2007, 12:54:52 PM[/size][hr]Please help, I really want to check my feats out and stuff on my server.

item.title: Need help with making admin on R00nscape source (cheezscape i think)
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

ok, then, he means client.java

serach for admins till u see something like this:

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Doobie”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Disturbed0ne"))
			{
				playerRights = 1;
			}
			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("DarkShadowz"))
			{
				playerRights = 1;
			}

[/code]

instead of one of the names type the name of the character you wwant owner/admin/mod, then type instead of the number behind playerrights = 1 for mod, 2 for admin and 3 for owner. but thats very clear i think

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making admin on R00nscape source (cheezscape i think)

item.title: Need help with making admin on R00nscape source (cheezscape i think)
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

no to jehanne what client file chipmunk? I went to characters, clicked on Matt and changed rights to 3, i logged out of my server, i have also did it where i turn server off first, and i logged back in 30 seconds later and tried to spawn items, didnt work, i talked, no crown. i have the r00nscape source based on cheezscape

Read full topic

Did you do it in the charcter files? if you did then you did it wrong. It in the Client file[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @chipmunk_man chipmunk man
item.description:
@chipmunk_man wrote:

Well, this is what you do.(Note, will be typed in bold)
Turn your server off and then change your rights save wait 35 seconds and turn it back on
Plus, don’t bump/double post
